IRS990.Desc: Education of the general public about giving donations and facilitation of the contribution of donations to qualified non-profit organizations operating in the U.S.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Management has evaluated the Organization's tax positions and concluded that the Organization's financial statements do not include any uncertain tax positions.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The donor advised fund makes grants to charities based on designations of the donor. Therefore, there is no subsequent monitoring of the use of the funds by the Organization.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization makes its governing documents and financial statements available upon request.
The Organization's Audit Committee is responsible for oversight of the audit and selection of the independent accountant, the process has not changed from previous years.
